description: Configuration for generating different AI character variations

better_looking.name: Better-Looking
better_looking.prompt_modifier: better-looking, enhanced features, more attractive, refined appearance

japanese_looking.name: Japanese-Looking
japanese_looking.prompt_modifier: Japanese appearance, East Asian features, Japanese ethnicity

more_male.name: More Male
more_male.prompt_modifier: more masculine, stronger male features, masculine appearance

more_female.name: More Female
more_female.prompt_modifier: more feminine, softer female features, feminine appearance

white_skinned.name: White-Skinned
white_skinned.prompt_modifier: white skin tone, fair skin, light complexion

dark_skinned.name: Dark-Skinned
dark_skinned.prompt_modifier: dark skin tone, deep complexion, darker skin

realistic.name: Realistic
realistic.prompt_modifier: photorealistic, realistic lighting, high detail, lifelike

game_render_realistic.name: Game Render Realistic
game_render_realistic.prompt_modifier: game engine render, Unreal Engine style, realistic game graphics, 3D game character

2d_cartoon.name: 2D Cartoon
2d_cartoon.prompt_modifier: 2D cartoon style, animated illustration, cartoon art, flat shading

3d_cartoon.name: 3D Cartoon
3d_cartoon.prompt_modifier: 3D cartoon style, Pixar style, stylized 3D, cartoon render
